alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:20PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Twin Falls, northwestern Jerome, southeastern Elmore, and Gooding Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Twentymile Butte, or 16 miles southeast of Glenns Ferry, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bliss around 430 PM MDT. Gooding around 500 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
